recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add beef and brown. Add vegetables, tomatoes, and herbs. Simmer for 30 minutes. Cook pasta separately. Serve sauce over pasta with grated cheese.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat oils in wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
recipes.instructions: Season salmon with oil, salt, and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. Meanwhile, make sauce by melting butter with garlic, lemon juice, zest, and dill. Pour over grilled salmon and serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms until browned, set aside. In same pan, cook onion and garlic. Add rice and toast for 2 minutes. Add wine and stir until absorbed. Add broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until absorbed before adding more. Fold in mushrooms, butter, and cheese. Season and garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown beef in pan, drain excess fat. Add taco seasoning and water as per packet instructions. Simmer for 5 minutes. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef and top with lettuce, cheese, tomato, sour cream, salsa, and avocado. Serve with lime wedges.

recipes.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Peppers
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Sauté onion and garlic in oil. Mix with quinoa, spinach, feta, and oregano. Season with salt and pepper. Fill pepper halves with mixture. Bake for 30 minutes. Top with toasted pine nuts before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Season chicken with salt and pepper, then cook in oil until done. Remove chicken. In same pan, add garlic and butter. Add cream and bring to simmer. Stir in cheese until melted. Add chicken back to sauce. Toss with drained pasta. Garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry with Tofu
recipes.instructions: Press and drain tofu. Heat oil and fry tofu until golden. Set aside. In same pan, cook curry paste for 1 minute. Add coconut milk, soy sauce, and sugar. Bring to simmer. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. Return tofu to pan and warm through. Garnish with basil and serve with rice and lime wedges.

recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Mix spices and rub over pork. Place in slow cooker with broth. Cook on low for 8 hours. Shred meat and mix with BBQ sauce. Serve on buns topped with coleslaw.

recipes.name: Roasted Ratatouille
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Toss all vegetables with oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper. Spread on baking sheets in single layer. Roast for 40-45 minutes, stirring halfway through. Combine in serving dish and garnish with fresh basil.
